snippet: Representative James P. Moran says members of Congress cannot “live decently” in Washington on their $174,000 salary and deserve more money.
abstract: Representative James P Moran, Virginia Democrat, says members of Congress cannot 'live decently' in Washington on their $174,000 salary and deserve more money; their pay has been frozen since 2010.
lead_paragraph: Representative James P. Moran says members of Congress cannot “live decently” in Washington on their $174,000 salary and deserve more money.

headline.main: Lawmakers Deserve More Pay, Congressman Says
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Deserve More Pay, Congressman Says
